## Infrastructure
Network

  - one prefix only: 2aff::cafe:cafe/56
  - routed between nodes wont matter (FLW)

VM: 1 vCPU; 4GB RAM; 10GB disk

  - `pg1` Data/Clusternode
  - `pg2` Data/Clusternode
  - `pg3` Data/Clusternode
  - `bm0` Backup / Datasink
